snippet.title: Robo Frenzy Trailer
snippet.description:
Robo Frenzy is combines the thrills of a boss battle with the crafting gameplay of Factorio and the Incredible Machine to make an action game where players build and battle at the same time. Players fight kaiju-sized gadgets to get materials to build weapon producing factories. Putting materials into factories creates different weapons players can use to defeat mammoth machines. Linking factories together in a chain creates even more powerful weapons players, but watch out enemies can craft items with materials too and even steal the weapons you make. 

Players can also construct inventions to help them takedown rampaging radios and temper-tantrum throwing TVs. Connect cannons to their factory to make auto-shooting towers or link your own robots at the end of a factory to make an automated fighting force. Robo Frenzy gives players the freedom to fight how they want and to use their creativity to build inventions that turn the tide of battle.
